title: Gata-Pishi
sinopse: A man suddenly appears in front of Ageha's house. He says that he's a god from Hell! He forces Ageha to give him name so that he can be free from a seal that had imprisoned him. Without thinking, Ageha gives "Madoka" as his name. But, when the seal is broken, that gorgeous Madoka turned into a child. (Source: M-U)
